title: Mark Rutte – 2023 Statement on Hamas Attack on Israel
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Mark Rutte, the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, on 7 October 2023.
content:
Just spoke with Prime Minister [@netanyahu](https://twitter.com/netanyahu) about the unprecedented attack by Hamas on Israel. I told him that the Netherlands unequivocally condemns this terrorist violence and fully supports Israel’s right to defend itself.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
